dotnetType.name: TypeResolver
dotnetType.remarks:
See the <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.TypeResolution" /> class for more information about the resolution
            framework.
dotnetType.summary: A customizable type resolver backed by a list of cases.

overloads.summary:
A list of cases that the resolver will attempt to apply. If the first case fails, the
            resolver will try the next case, and so on until all cases have been attempted.
Whether to resolve reference types as nullable.

returns.summary: A subclass of <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.TypeResolution" /> that contains information about the type.

overloads.summary: Resolves information for a .NET type, trying each case until a match is found.

returns.summary: A subclass of <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.TypeResolution" /> that contains information about the type.

overloads.summary: Resolves information for a .NET type, trying each case until a match is found.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TypeResolver extends System.Object implements class Chr.Avro.Resolution.ITypeResolver
